Friends

Configuration & configuration ()
 Returns a reference to the application configuration object.

Detailed Description

This is the one and only configuration object.

The member functions read() and write() can be used to load and save the properties to the application configuration file.

Author:
Lynn Hazan

Member Function Documentation

void Configuration::read (  ) 

Reads the configuration data from the application config file.

If a property does not already exist in the config file it will be set to a default value.

void Configuration::setTimeInterval ( int  time  )  [inline]

Sets the time interval between 2 lines drawn in the cluster views when the time dimension in selected.

The time time is in second.

int Configuration::getTimeInterval (  )  const [inline]

Returns the time interval between 2 lines drawn in the cluster views when the time dimension in selected.

The time is in second.

bool Configuration::isCrashRecoveryDefault (  )  const [inline]

Returns the default value for the crash and recovery mechanism.

True if a crash and recovery autosave is performed, false othewise.

int Configuration::getTimeIntervalDefault (  )  const [inline]

Returns the default time interval between 2 lines drawn in the cluster views when the time dimension in selected.

The time is in second.
